templateOptions.label: UserName
templateOptions.description: The Username to connect to Exact Proquro

templateOptions.label: ApiKey
templateOptions.description: The API Key used to authenticate. This must be retrieved from within the application

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The url to connect to Exact Proquro

templateOptions.label: Enable TLS1.2
templateOptions.description: Enables TLS 1.2. Note that is not necessary when running the connector in the cloud
